tests.prompt: Add a Character to gamectx registry. Call GetCharacter(ctx, id) and verify it returns the character and no error. Call GetCharacter with unknown ID and verify it returns an error.
Create a Character with 20 HP. Call ApplyDamage with 8 damage. Verify HP is now 12 and DroppedToZero is false.
Create a Character with 10 HP. Call ApplyDamage with 15 damage. Verify HP is 0 (not negative) and DroppedToZero is true.
Load a Character into gamectx with 20 HP. Call combat.DealDamage with 8 slashing damage. Verify character HP is now 12.
Subscribe to DamageApplied event. Call combat.DealDamage. Verify DamageApplied event was received with correct TotalDamage and TargetID.
Subscribe to ResolveDamage chain at features stage. When event fires, add +2 to damage. Call DealDamage with 8 base damage. Verify final damage applied is 10.
